headline: Will RTX’s Valuation Hold After Pentagon Pushes Missile Suppliers to Boost Production?
summary: If you have been trying to figure out whether RTX deserves a spot in your portfolio, you are not alone. It has been a remarkable year for the stock, with shares climbing nearly 36% since January and almost doubling over the last three years. Even this past month, RTX managed a modest gain of 1.7%, despite a recent dip of 5.3% this week, serving as a reminder that sentiment around defense stocks can shift quickly on headlines. It is impossible to ignore the surging long-term momentum either,...
